text:
Happy New Year! :partyparrot:

I am looking for a contractor to work across multiple clients optimizing website analytics (GTM, GA, HS Tracking Script, cross-domain tracking, ad pixels, conversion events) and updating websites on HubSpot CMS, WordPress, and Webflow.

:dart: *Must-Have Skills:*
• Advanced GTM & GA expertise
• HTML, CSS, jQuery, JS basics
• Experience with tagging, analytics, and cross-domain tracking
• CMS Dev skills on HubSpot, WordPress, Webflow
:alarm_clock: Flexible hours (5-10/week to start, potential to scale up). Great opportunity to work with startups and established brands! DM me if interested or know someone who might be!
